radio_info.short: Prayas Manobik Unnayon Society's activities 'Radio Mahananda' started its journey on 22 April 2010 with the approval of the Ministry of Information, Government of the
radio_info.rest:
People's Republic of Bangladesh. The local community based electronic media 'Radio Mahananda' is a regular active broadcasting program dedicated to the welfare of people of all walks of life in the region.
Objectives of the program: To create opportunities for participation in the media of Chapai Nawabganj and adjoining local communities for education, culture, development and transparency and accountability of democratic governance.
Strategies : Development program identification of problems, exchange of experiences, finding solutions to problems, interaction, interaction and learning.

radios.title: Radio Metrowave
radios.profile_slogan: Feel the Power of Music & Information

radio_info.short: RADIO METRO WAVE'S weekly program ARTHONEETIR HALCHAL focuses on the day to day economic issues of the world and in Bangladesh. It talks about economic
radio_info.rest:
systems of free market and those that are not independent due to excessive government controls.

Participants include economists and newspaper editors to businesspersons. Topics include deregulation of the market, trade liberalization, lower taxes, and broad reduction of economic intervention by the State bureaucracy. The program speaks for the economic freedom of the consumer and the producer in a free market where the role of government is restricted to protecting life, liberty and property.

A vigorous debate and discussions challenge the role of the government as well as the freedom of the man unrestrained by any authority such as the State and the government. Today, no political organization is arguing or ideologically rethinking about these issues that only can uplift Bangladesh economy from its present day poverty trap to a prosperous tomorrow.

radio_info.rest: Bangladeshi 1st community radio

radio_contacts.short: Bangladeshi 1st community radio

radio_info.short: Radio Boral 90.0 FM is a community radio in Bangladesh in the Rajshahi District. Established by SBMSS as a non-profitable social entrepreneurship program, Radio Boral
radio_info.rest: aims to remove poverty, discrimination, and injustice of rural populations by involving them with information. Radio Boral works together with community people for making & broadcasting daily 9 hours with programs and news on health, education, agriculture, career, sanitation, local culture and heritage programs, talk-shows, live events, sports, legal aid, rights and empowerment of girls and women and disadvantaged groups such as horijon/3rd genders and ethnic minorities, PSA (Public Service Announcement) on social awareness, relevant socio-cultural and economic issues.

radio_contacts.short: Radio Boral 90.0 FM is a community radio in Bangladesh in the Rajshahi District. Established by SBMSS as a non-profitable social entrepreneurship program, Radio Boral

radio_contact.address: Babul Super Market, Joy Banglar mor, Arani 6281 Rajshahi, Rajshahi Division, Bangladesh
